vote.title: Authorize the (1) deposit of the amount awarded by the Special Commissioners in the condemnation proceeding styled CITY OF DALLAS VS. MARCO SORTO, et al., Cause No. CC-22-01269-C, pending in Dallas County Court at Law No. 3, for acquisition from Marco Sorto, of two tracts of land containing approximately 10,579 square feet, improved with a single-family residence located on Alex Street near its intersection with Childers Street for the Dallas Floodway Extension Project; and (2) settlement of the condemnation proceeding for an amount not to exceed the award - Not to exceed $178,000.00 ($175,000.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $3,000.00) - Flood Protection and Storm Drainage Facilities Fund (2006 General Obligation Bond Funds)
